alert.note: Alert for Southern Twin Falls County; Western Magic Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 21 at 1:26PM MST until January 22 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 5 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of two to four inches. Twin Falls should receive around two inches. * WHERE...Southern Twin Falls County zones and the extreme south part of the Western Magic Valley that includes Twin Falls. US Highway 93 from Twin Falls southward is included. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 5 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Southern Twin Falls County; Western Magic Valley
